t: About the brand | Heirlome - Official Site
s: Heirlome is the middle English word for Heirloom, a valuable object that has been part of a family for many generations. Heirlome comes from combining the two words heir and lome, lome meaning tool. We believe that knowledge, craft and skill are invaluable heirlooms.

Luxury Streetwear Brand out of Brooklyn, New York. HEIRLOOM represents garments crafted with exceptional craftsmanship and timeless design, intended to be passed down through generations as a symbol of enduring value and royalty. Come Shop Heirloom!!!
